title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\SparkJob
name: SparkJob
description:
A Dataproc job for running Apache Spark applications on YARN.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.SparkJob

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.main_jar_file_uri
params.description: The HCFS URI of the jar file that contains the main class.

params.name: data.main_class
params.description: The name of the driver's main class. The jar file that contains the class must be in the default CLASSPATH or specified in jar_file_uris.

params.name: data.args
params.description: Optional. The arguments to pass to the driver. Do not include arguments, such as --conf, that can be set as job properties, since a collision may occur that causes an incorrect job submission.

params.name: data.jar_file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of jar files to add to the CLASSPATHs of the Spark driver and tasks.

params.name: data.file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of files to be placed in the working directory of each executor. Useful for naively parallel tasks.

params.name: data.archive_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of archives to be extracted into the working directory of each executor. Supported file types: .jar, .tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, and .zip.

params.name: data.properties
params.description: Optional. A mapping of property names to values, used to configure Spark. Properties that conflict with values set by the Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/spark/conf/spark-defaults.conf and classes in user code.

params.name: data.logging_config
params.description: Optional. The runtime log config for job execution.
